pullrequest.title: physics: Actually using new use_dynamic_moi_rescaling tag.

content.raw:
unless there's a strong preference to using `use_dynamic_moi_rescaling`, can you synchronize the [key to `inertia_ratio_reduction`](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/291cb3a00a29ed89f2bee266fab7dd75512bbd80/gazebo/physics/ode/ODEPhysics.cc#cl-1324)?

Also, please add @caguero @iche033 as reviewers?  Need one more approval and Steve is out.

Thanks!
content.html:
unless there's a strong preference to using use_dynamic_moi_rescaling, can you synchronize the key to inertia_ratio_reduction?

Also, please add @caguero @iche033 as reviewers? Need one more approval and Steve is out.
